raw:
{
  "rules": [
    {
      "rule_id": "ak_crust",
      "question": "Is the lesion typically scaly or crusty?",
      "answer_type": "bool",
      "correct_answer": "yes",
      "candidate_answers": ["yes", "no"],
      "keywords": ["actinic keratosis", "scale", "crust"],
      "evidence_snippet": "Actinic keratosis lesions are often scaly or crusty."
    },
    {
      "rule_id": "bcc_pearly",
      "question": "Does the lesion commonly present with a pearly appearance?",
      "answer_type": "bool",
      "correct_answer": "yes",
      "candidate_answers": ["yes", "no"],
      "keywords": ["basal cell carcinoma", "pearly", "translucent"],
      "evidence_snippet": "Basal cell carcinoma frequently exhibits a pearly or translucent border."
    },
    {
      "rule_id": "melanoma_asymmetry",
      "question": "Is asymmetry a common feature of this lesion?",
      "answer_type": "bool",
      "correct_answer": "yes",
      "candidate_answers": ["yes", "no"],
      "keywords": ["melanoma", "asymmetry", "ABCDE"],
      "evidence_snippet": "Melanoma is often asymmetric in shape."
    },
    {
      "rule_id": "nevus_benign_features",
      "question": "Which features are typical of a benign melanocytic nevus?",
      "answer_type": "list",
      "correct_answer": ["symmetry", "uniform color", "smooth borders"],
      "candidate_answers": ["symmetry", "uniform color", "smooth borders", "rapid growth", "ulceration"],
      "keywords": ["melanocytic nevus", "benign", "symmetry"],
      "evidence_snippet": "Melanocytic nevi are typically symmetric, uniformly pigmented, and have smooth borders."
    },
    {
      "rule_id": "exclude_melanoma_if_stable",
      "question": "Is melanoma less likely when the lesion has been stable for years?",
      "answer_type": "bool",
      "correct_answer": "yes",
      "candidate_answers": ["yes", "no"],
      "keywords": ["melanoma", "stable", "long-standing"],
      "evidence_snippet": "Exclude melanoma if the lesion has remained unchanged for many years."
    }
  ]
}

rules.question: Is the lesion typically scaly or crusty?
rules.evidence_snippet: Actinic keratosis lesions are often scaly or crusty.

rules.question: Does the lesion commonly present with a pearly appearance?
rules.evidence_snippet: Basal cell carcinoma frequently exhibits a pearly or translucent border.

rules.question: Is asymmetry a common feature of this lesion?
rules.evidence_snippet: Melanoma is often asymmetric in shape.

rules.question: Which features are typical of a benign melanocytic nevus?
rules.evidence_snippet: Melanocytic nevi are typically symmetric, uniformly pigmented, and have smooth borders.

rules.question: Is melanoma less likely when the lesion has been stable for years?
rules.evidence_snippet: Exclude melanoma if the lesion has remained unchanged for many years.
